title: The Soldier She Could Never Forget
description: Some things you never forget… Your first time. Your first love. Your first broken heart. Or, in Jessi Riley's case, all three combined in one…as Clinton Marks. Bad boy extraordinaire, Clint left town the night of Jessi's graduation, after sharing one unforgettable night together. Now, two decades later, he's back in her life as the military doctor looking after her daughter! As shared memories float to the surface, Jessi and Clint can no longer deny their longing for each other. Could it be that second time around, one night will become forever?
author: Tina Beckett
